title: ANZACS
creator_credit: George Miller, John Dixon, Pino Amenta, Geoff Burrowes, Film Victoria and Burrowes Dixon Production Company
brief_description: Television series which looks at the ANZAC campaign and the brave soldiers who fought a bloody but hopeless battle in Turkey and wrote thmeselves into a chapter of Australia’s history.
